sentence: Israel  says  its  aim  is  to  eliminate  Hamas  in  Gaza  so  it  doesn't  carry  out  another  attack  like  its  Oct.  7  assault  that  killed  some  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel.
The  military's  resulting  bombardment  of  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  17,000  people,  Gaza  health  officials  say,  and  rendered  much  of  Gaza's  historic  core  a  wasteland.
